name: Block Me To The Moon
description:
Poor blocky has fallen from the sky!  It is still within reach, you need a few scaffoldings to take him back!

In this Tetris-style game, you will have to take your hammer, a few nails, and build your way to the sky.

Be aware though, Blocky is a fragile thing, crushing it would kill him!

"We are over the moon for the game" - GGJ 2020.

GAME DESIGN :
- Nathan MEZZA
- Kevin SOULIER
 
GAME ART :
- Natacha BRABANTS

GAME PROGRAMMING :
- Maxime BIENBEAU
- Luca GERBER
- Thibault PAGERIE

SOUND DESIGN :
- Nathan MEZZA
- Kevin SOULIER
